name: Davidoff Cool Water
short_description:
The simple pleasures of a life purely lived; Russian-born Zino Davidoff reveled in it all with distinct humor. The Davidoff philosophy-"the good life" - is embodied in his perfumes. Uncomplicated, wholesome scents - Adventure; Cool Water, and Silver Shadow - are the essential sensual experiences by Davidoff Perfumes and are essentials for the worldly. Some would call it 'very Zino.' Davidoff was a lover of all things beautiful. He was noted for having impeccable taste and outright elegance. He lived; no he created and embodied, the Davidoff mantra, "No one gets a second chance to leave a good first impression."
